message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $152?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $147. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob. I'll give you a slight concession. How about $149?
I'm getting close to a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $148. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm almost there, Bob. I'll give you one more concession. How about $149.50?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $149. Can you meet me at that price?
